post.description: This endpoint logs in a user by checking the credentials and generating JWT tokens.
This endpoint allows adding a student to a specific group.
This endpoint allows adding a teacher to a specific group.
This endpoint is used to create a new group in the system.

delete.description: This endpoint is used to delete a group from the system.
This endpoint allows deleting a student from a specific group.
This endpoint allows deleting a teacher from a specific group.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves all groups with optional filters like room and subject.
This endpoint retrieves the details of a group by its ID.
This endpoint retrieves the list of groups a specific student belongs to.
This endpoint retrieves the list of students in a specific group.
This endpoint retrieves the list of groups a specific teacher belongs to.

put.description: This endpoint is used to update the details of an existing group.

post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new Subject in the system.

delete.description: This endpoint deletes a subject by its ID.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific subject by its ID.
This endpoint retrieves all subjects with pagination.

put.description: This endpoint updates an existing subject by its ID.

get.description: Get test cases by question id

delete.description: Ushbu API orqali mavjud topicni o'chirishingiz mumkin.

parameters.description: Unique household ID to filter by
parameters.name: HhId
